item.title: [Journal] Deep3DLayout: 3D reconstruction of an indoor layout from a spherical panoramic image
item.description: Abstract Recovering the 3D shape of the bounding permanent surfaces of a room from a single image is a key component of indoor reconstruction pipelines. In this article, we introduce a novel deep learning technique capable to produce, at interactive rates, a tessellated bounding 3D surface from a single 360Â° image. Differently from prior solutions, we fully address the problem in 3D, significantly expanding the reconstruction space of prior solutions.
